body: Polaroid ======== jQuery plugin to create some old school polaroid images Installation ------------ Download the plugin [zipball](https://github.com/me1ifaro/Polaroid/archive/master.zip) or you can install it using bower ```sh $ bower install Polaroid ``` I suggest using [velocity](https://github.com/julianshapiro/velocity) instead of standard ```jQuery.animate()``` All you have to do is include ```velocity.js``` somewhere in your page.
